channel.title: [PI] Custom Crowns [PI]
channel.description:
I was following this tutorial http://tinyurl.com/5errorspleasehelp (It's Rune_Server) and I was going good with no errors until the last step.
[CODE]client.java:7523: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Background(java.lang.String) location: class Background modIcons[1] = new Background(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/mod _icons1.png"); //Player Rights 1 ^ client.java:7524: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Background(java.lang.String) location: class Background modIcons[2] = new Background(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/mod _icons2.png"); //Player Rights 2 ^ client.java:7525: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Background(java.lang.String) location: class Background modIcons[3] = new Background(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/mod _icons3.png"); //player Rights 3 ^ client.java:7526: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Background(java.lang.String) location: class Background modIcons[4] = new Background(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/mod _icons4.png"); //Player Rights 4 ^ client.java:7527: cannot find symbol symbol : constructor Background(java.lang.String) location: class Background modIcons[5] = new Background(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/mod _icons5.png"); //Member Crown ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
I know it says cannot find symbol in Background.java, but I have no clue on what to add to make it work. Please help?
